fields.name: But God Shirt
fields.description: Wear this Christian T-Shirt to spread the good news of the ultimate symbol of God’s love for all to see. Look to the Cross and receive your salvation.

fields.name: Chosen Generation
fields.description: Truly, my dear young friends, you are a chosen generation. I hope you will never forget it. I hope you will never take it for granted. I hope there will grow in your hearts an overpowering sense of gratitude to God, who has made it possible for you to come upon the earth in this marvelous season of the world's history.

fields.name: Jesus and Faith
fields.description: This is inspired by our faith in Christ Jesus. We hope this shirt will be a reminder to you and those around you that faith comes by hearing, and hearing by the Word of God.

fields.name: Light Shirt
fields.description: Jesus answered, “I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.

fields.name: Saved Black Shirt
fields.description: Saved by grace through faith in Jesus Christ. This shirt is a reminder of the grace of God that saves us from our sins.

fields.name: Saved Biege Shirt
fields.description: Saved by grace through faith in Jesus Christ. This shirt is a reminder of the grace of God that saves us from our sins.

fields.name: Spirit Led Hoodie
fields.description: This hoodie is inspired by the Holy Spirit. We hope this hoodie will be a reminder to you and those around you that the Holy Spirit is our helper.

fields.name: True Love Shirt
fields.description: This shirt is inspired by the love of God. We hope this shirt will be a reminder to you and those around you that God is love.

fields.name: G.O.A.T
fields.description: God over Any Things. This Hoodies gives you the motivation to put God first in everything you do.

fields.name: Saviour Hoodie
fields.description: SAVIOUR. This has the inspiration that Jesus is our saviour. We hope this hoodie will be a reminder to you and those around you that Jesus is our saviour.

fields.name: Love Never Fails
fields.description: Love Never Fails. This has the inspiration that God's love never fails. We hope this shirt will be a reminder to you and those around you that God's love never fails.

fields.name: Waymaker Ladies
fields.description: Waymaker, Miracle Worker, Promise Keeper, Light in the Darkness. This has the inspiration that God is the waymaker. We hope this shirt will be a reminder to you and those around you that God is the waymaker.

fields.name: Blessed-Mom Ladies
fields.description: Blessed Mom is a shirt that is meant to inspire mothers. We hope this shirt will be a reminder to you and those around you that you are a blessed mom. It ia also a great gift for mothers.

fields.name: Crazy for God Ladies
fields.description: To be Crazy for God is the best thing that can happen to anyone. We hope this shirt will be a reminder to you and those around you that you are crazy for God.

fields.name: Elevate Tank Top
fields.description: Elevate Your Faith to another level of elevation with this Christian Tank Top from PB Majestics. Inspired by Deuteronomy 28:1, this Christian tank is designed to make Faith the center focal point in our lives and to encourage all in this world of darkness to never lose hope. Remember that even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise to see another day.

fields.name: Elevate your Faith Hoodie
fields.description: Elevate Your Faith to another level of elevation with this Christian Hoodie from PB Majestics. Inspired by Deuteronomy 28:1, this Christian tank is designed to make Faith the center focal point in our lives and to encourage all in this world of darkness to never lose hope. Remember that even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise to see another day

fields.name: Faith Flower Ladies
fields.description: Keep a positive attitude in strengthening and feeding your faith in Christ, the overcomer of all things! Give worship and praise to our Lord in love and adoration. Allow faith to strengthen and manifest in your hearts to grow to the point where you can move mountains through Christ’s strength!

fields.name: G.O.A.T Tank Top
fields.description: G.O.A.T is another nice concept of Tank top collections from PB Majestics. God over Any Things. This Hoodies gives you the motivation to put God first in everything you do.

fields.name: He Came Tank Top
fields.description: He Came,He Saw and He concurred. This is a nice concept of Tank top collections from PB Majestics. Embrace God’s glory and honor our Master’s victory over death with this Christian Tank Top featuring “He Came He Saw He Conquered” . Christ is Risen!

fields.name: Love Like Jesus Shirt
fields.description: Love Like Jesus is another master piece from PB Majestics. This shirt is inspired by the love of God. We hope this shirt will be a reminder to you and those around you that God is love.

fields.name: Love Never Fails Tank Top
fields.description: Take the city by storm and make a bold statement with this Christian Tank Top that features one of the most popular Bible verses, “Love Never Fails” 1 Corinthians 13:8 front text graphic. Inspired by Bible Scripture 1 Corinthians 13:8, this Christian Fashion apparel is designed to remember the greatest gift given to us from Jesus himself, the power of love that never fails.

fields.name: Trust Black Shirt
fields.description: Trust only in the Lord. Show your journey of Faith by Walking in Favor of God with this soft feel Christian Crewneck Sweatshirt featuring a beautiful front “Walk by Faith and Not by Sight” bible verse text graphic and Fabrics of Faith logo on the back.

fields.name: Walk on Water Shirt
fields.description: Walk on Water is another master piece from PB Majestics. This shirt is inspired by the Miracles of Jesus. We hope this shirt will be a reminder to you and those around you that God is love.
